LanguageData.Plant_Potato.label: Potato Plant
LanguageData.Plant_Potato.description: Potato Plants produce nutritious tubers called Potatoes. Potato Plants grow quickly and are a reliable food source crop for basic meals.
LanguageData.Plant_Corn.label: Corn Plant
LanguageData.Plant_Corn.description: Corn Plants are large grain plants that produce ears of delicious yellow seeds that are called Corn. Corn Plants grow slowly but yeild lots of food. Corn is useful as a food ingredient or for making Ethanol Fuel.
LanguageData.Plant_Rice.label: Rice Plant
LanguageData.Plant_Rice.description: Rice Plants are short grain plants that yields numerous amounts of edible seeds called Rice. Rice is useful as a meal ingredient, can be made into Ethanol Fuel or distilled into Sake from the Brewery.
LanguageData.Plantbean.label: Bean Stalk
LanguageData.Plantbean.description: A Bean Stalk produces a Bean Pod, a soft shell with small, edible seeds inside. They can be used as a meal ingredient or can be refined into BioDiesel Fuel.
LanguageData.PlantTomato.label: Tomato Vine
LanguageData.PlantTomato.description: Tomato Vines produce round, palm sized, red, sharp-tasting fruits called Tomatoes. Tomatoes are related to Potato Plants and grow very quickly.
LanguageData.PlantCarrot.label: Carrot Plant
LanguageData.PlantCarrot.description: Carrot Plants produce long, crunchy, orange root vegetables called Carrots. Carrots are refreshing to eat raw and have a long shelf life.
LanguageData.Plant_Mushroom.label: Champignon Mushroom
LanguageData.Plant_Mushroom.description: Champignon Mushrooms produce white or brown edible caps called Raw Champignon. This robust mushroom has been genetically engineered and is cultivated to produce a filling meat substitute.
